meta.label: Export to Power BI (with OAuth)
meta.description: Custom DSS Exporter to Microsoft Power BI (online versions). This version requires a valid access token stored in your Project Variables.

params.name: overwrite
params.label: Overwrite dataset
params.description: Whether Power BI dataset will be overwritten or not (or created in the case of a new export)

params.name: buffer_size
params.label: Buffer size
params.description: Number of records to send to Power BI at each write
